module.name: surface_conditions
module.keywords: module, surface condition, surface state, surface treatment

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of surface properties and surface treatment applied to a material. It covers surface characteristics which can be defined by a designer to achieve the required functionality of a part or to satisfy aesthetic requirements.

inscope.li: Association of a Surface condition with a shape;
surface irregularities such as roughness and waviness;
items within the scope of application module Dimension tolerance, ISO/TS 10303-1050;
items within the scope of application module Generic material aspects, ISO/TS 10303-1681;
items within the scope of application module Part view definition, ISO/TS 10303-1023;
items within the scope of application module Value with unit extension, ISO/TS 10303-1753.
